overview: A recently divorced Cherry Kiss taking to the road with her best friend Anna Polina sounds like the perfect getaway… but what starts as a trip to get a break from men and relax, soon turns into so much more! Nothing will stop Cherry’s wild nature shining through, opportunities are sure to arise wherever she goes, and if a broken-down motorhome, a surf lesson, or a dinner date aren’t excuse enough, a photoshoot on the beach with the spectacular Agatha Vega will surely do the trick!
title: Trip of My Life
